about_the_game:
FPV Battleground is a dynamic drone combat simulator with the most realistic and immersive drone flying experience. Immerse yourself in the world of high-stakes drone warfare, where precision and strategy are your best allies. Control modern military drones from a first-person perspective and destroy enemy vehicles on the battlefield.

Key features:

- Complex, realistic physics: FPV Battleground offers an unrivaled flight experience with advanced systems, including radio horizon effects, electronic warfare (EW), and realistic battery management for a truly immersive gameplay experience.

- Professional-grade drone customization: Customise your drone with professional settings like speed and PID tuning, allowing experienced players to fine-tune their flying style and optimize performance.

- Advanced OSD (On-Screen Display) settings: Customise the on-screen display to show critical information such as battery level, altitude, speed, signal strength, and other important metrics to keep you in control at all times.

- Large maps of the natural world: Explore large, detailed maps created using real-world altitude data to test your piloting skills in different terrains and conditions.

- Various missions: Take part in various combat scenarios, each with unique objectives that challenge your piloting, strategy, and combat skills.

- Various weapons: Choose from an arsenal of projectiles and explosives to destroy enemy vehicles and complete your missions.

FPV Battleground is distinguished by its attention to detail and commitment to providing a highly realistic and personalized experience for beginners and experienced drone pilots. Whether you're mastering the intricacies of drone physics or taking on challenging combat missions, this game delivers unparalleled authenticity and excitement.

content_descriptors.notes:
The only content that may be sensitive to certain players is related to combat and violence, as players control military drones to destroy enemy equipment. However, the game does not contain graphic scenes of violence or blood. The game focuses on tactics, maneuvering, and destroying equipment with drones.

The game is recommended for players interested in combat drone simulations and military strategies.

short_description: FPV Battleground is a dynamic FPV drone control simulator with realistic physics. Players get the opportunity to control drones from a first-person perspective, maneuvering with maximum accuracy and efficiency. Your task is to destroy enemy vehicles using all the capabilities of FPV drones.
